title: Sticker Studio Pro
description: An advanced sticker board application that allows users to create, customize, and organize their own digital stickers. Users can drag and drop stickers onto a canvas, resize and rotate them, and save their creations for later use.
tech: Canvas API (for rendering the sticker board and stickers)
Drag and Drop API (for handling sticker movement)
LocalStorage (for saving sticker creations and board layouts)
